resources.string: Try to do as many push-ups as you can in a minute. enter the number of push-ups below
Try to do as many pull-ups as you can in a minute. enter the number of pull-ups below
Try to do as many squats as you can in a minute. enter the number of squats below
Try to run or jog for 1km and note down the time taken to run 1km
try to do a plank for as long as you can. note down the time
Try to do as many crunches as you can in a minute. enter the number of crunches below
